text: Samuel Nkemena, OBE was an Anglican bishop in the 20th century.NPG details Nkemena was educated at St Paul's College, Awka and ordained in 1931. He was a parish priest from then until his appointment as Archdeacon of Aba in 1949. In 1955 he became Archdeacon of Owerri;Bishop Cockin Church Centre and also that year an Assistant Bishop to the Bishop on the Niger. He retired in 1961.Crockford's Clerical Directory 1967/8 p910: London, OUP, 1967 ==References== Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:Archdeacons of Aba Category:Archdeacons of Owerri Category:Paul University alumni
title: Samuel Nkemena
